titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before His Excellency, the Ld. Lieutenant and the two Houses of Parliament in Christ's-Church, Dublin when they first met there together on Sunday, October 16, 1692 / by John, Lord Archbishop of Tuam.
titleStmt.author: Vesey, John, 1636-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
